drag_and_drop: Drag and drop or browse to upload your document. We support PDF files.
file_not_found: File not found or not accessible
file_does_not_exist: File does not exist on disk
delete_account_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and all your data will be permanently lost.
drag_and_drop_file: Drag and drop your file here.
are_you_sure_logout: Are you sure you want to log out?
password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
password_upper_lower: Password must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter
password_number: Password must contain at least one number
privacy_policy_content: Your privacy is important to us. Study Buddy does not share your personal information with third parties. All your data is securely stored and only used to enhance your study experience. For more details, please review our full privacy policy.
privacy_policy_footer: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your data.
about_study_buddy_content:
Aura is your AI-powered study partner, designed to help you learn, organize, and succeed. Whether you need summaries, document management, or smart study tools, Aura is here to support your academic journey.

Enjoy a seamless, adaptive experience in both light and dark mode!
onboarding_subtitle: Upload your documents, get summaries, and take quizzes.
